mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, p.po_name, d.dept_name, e.emp_hp, e.emp_add, e.emp_hiredate FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN tbl_position p ON e.po_id = p.po_id ORDER by emp_id

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, p.po_name, d.dept_name, e.emp_hp, e.emp_add, e.emp_hiredate FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN tbl_position p ON e.po_id = p.po_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{emp_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET emp_name = #{empName}, dept_id = #{deptId}, po_id = #{poId}, emp_hp = #{empHp}, emp_add = #{empAdd}, emp_hiredate = #{empHiredate}, WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
